summary: REQ-12 appears partially implemented by updating the hero primary CTA copy to "PLANS" in the centralized siteCopy.ts, but the diff does not provide evidence that the final CTA (contact section) label and all remaining "Start Free Trial" occurrences were updated via siteCopy. REQ-13 is described as implemented (Talk to Sales opens the Discord invite in a new tab with safe handling) in the provided file summary, but the actual code change is not visible in the truncated Sections.tsx snippet.

missing_requirements.requirement: In the final CTA section (Contact section), the primary CTA button label displays exactly "PLANS" and comes from frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts (not hardcoded).
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts shows hero.primaryCTA set to "PLANS", but the diff snippet is truncated before any finalCTA/contact-section copy, and Sections.tsx is truncated before the FinalCTA section rendering. No direct evidence that final CTA label was updated to "PLANS" via siteCopy.

missing_requirements.requirement: No other UI element still displays the exact text "Start Free Trial" after the change, with labels sourced from frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows one explicit change to hero.primaryCTA in siteCopy.ts; it does not show a comprehensive removal/update of all "Start Free Trial" strings across the UI, and content is truncated so remaining occurrences cannot be ruled out.
